download.title: Download Launchers
download.subtitle: Choose the right Minecraft launcher for you and start your gaming journey
download.instructions_subtitle: How to choose and use launchers
download.step1_desc: Select the appropriate launcher based on your needs. Featured launchers are usually more stable and user-friendly.
download.step2_desc: Click the download button to get the launcher, choose the version corresponding to your operating system.
download.step3_desc: After installation, configure the game path and Java environment to start using.

about.title: About MCiSEE
about.subtitle: Minecraft Launchers and Utility Websites Collection
about.intro_p1: MCiSEE is a comprehensive resource platform designed specifically for Minecraft players, dedicated to providing the most comprehensive and practical launcher and website resources.
about.intro_p2: We carefully collect and organize various excellent Minecraft launchers, as well as Minecraft-related utility websites, to help players better enjoy their gaming experience.
about.intro_p3: The project is completely open source, welcoming community contributions and feedback. Let's build a better Minecraft ecosystem together.
about.feature1_desc: Curated collection of excellent Minecraft launchers
about.feature3_desc: Completely open source and free to use forever
about.confirm_reset: Are you sure you want to reset all settings?
about.team_subtitle: Thanks to all developers who contributed to the project
about.license_description: This project is open sourced under the MIT license. You are free to use, modify, and distribute it.
